      • setInetAddress

        public void setInetAddress(java.lang.String address)
                    throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Determines the Internet Address to connect to.
        Parameters:
        address - Internet Address to connect to.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Exception if the given Internet Address is not valid.

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int newport)
             throws InvalidPortException
        Determines the port to connect to. Only port numbers above 1000 are accepted.
        Parameters:
        port - Port to connect to.
        Throws:
        InvalidPortException - Exception if the given port is not in a valid range.

      • setPlayerName

        public void setPlayerName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the me-player's name in case me is a Human Player.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the me-player

      • setStrategy

        public void setStrategy(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the me-player's strategy in case me is a Computer Player.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the strategy.

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Connecting to server. If the connection fails, the TUI gets informed and the client resets.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the TUI, so starts the communication with the user.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the client.
